overview: Bagas (Ajun Perwira) really wants to be a musician. After his age of 17 old years, Bagas decides to pursue his dream and finds a way to be a musician. His mother (Ranty Purnamasari) does not approve the decision. Mother also does not approve Bagasâ€™ relationship with Mentari (Sonya Fatmala).
title: 17 Years Old and Over
